title: If it takes 6 painters 2 hours to paint 4 walls, how many hours does it take for 4 painters to paint 8 walls? - Quora

response.answer_text: Easy! Put away your slide ruler! Just take one painter. He takes one hour to paint 1/3 of a wall.. Boy these guys must be in the union for they are really slow.. so lets assume one painter painted all 8 walls. That is a lot of cigarette breaks, it would take him 24 hours to paint all 8 walls…. But he has 3 other buddies… yea! so 4 into 24 = 6 Hours!

The measured work content 6 painters x 2 hours = 12 hours work content to paint 4 walls, therefore for the pro-rata rates it takes 3 hours rate rate per wall. Answer: For 8 walls, This would require a total of 24 hours work, divided by 4 painters = 6 hours work for each painter
